mapper.insert: insert into t_data_resources (id, content, icon, name, state, uri, code, parent_code, description, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_data_resources set content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uri = #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_code = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, content, icon, name, state, uri, code, parent_code, description, create_time from t_data_resources
